Package ui.drawing.composition

Class BasicSectionComposer<T extends Section>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.drawing.layout.DrawableResponsiveSection
        • ui.drawing.composition.BasicSectionComposer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of sections that can be stored in the composer.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SectionComposer<T>, ResponsiveSection, PrintHandler, Section, ResizeHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LabeledMenuItem, NoOverlapSectionComposer
    public class BasicSectionComposer<T extends Section>
extends DrawableResponsiveSection
implements SectionComposer<T>
    Stores a map of coordinates to sections and assembles each row dynamically using each section's getRow method and a filler character. The sections should have priority by first x coordinate and then y coordinate.
    A responsive section with a stored number of rows and columns.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

        public BasicSectionComposer​(int width,
                            int height)
        Constructor for BasicSectionComposer. A tree map is used to order the sections by x then y coordinate.
        Parameters:

        height - The height of the composer in characters.

      • getRow

        public void getRow​(ColouredStringBuilder builder,
                   int row,
                   int startCol,
                   int maxCols)
        Generates a single line of the section to be written to the terminal. In this case check each x coordinate in turn, if a section has a character in this position append it, otherwise append the filler character.
        Specified by:
        getRow in interface Section
        Parameters:
        builder - ColouredStringBuilder to handle ANSI colour coding in the most efficient manner.
        row - Which row of the section to generate.
        startCol - The column of the section to start at.
        maxCols - The max number of columns to draw.

      • update

        public void update()
        Called before drawing the section. In this case call the update method of every contained section.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Section
        Overrides:
        update in class DrawableSection
